list.name: Default
list.comment: Example 17.2 fully ported, fixed lighting issues.

task.summary: Example 12.1 completely ported and fully working.
*HUGE* error in my Matrix4.toQuaternion class that caused buggy 3D movement in Example12.1. Also, completely reformat with Eclipse Formatter plugin for IDEA.
Forgot to remove a call to setFPS(0) in Example13.2.
Last update to README, I promise.
Modified the OTHER README files haha.
Fully ported Example 15.1. Also added "lookAt" method to Utils.
Forgot to remove the call to setFPS(0) in Example 15.1.
Fully ported Example 16.1. Also moved the 'dds' classes to their original packaging for better credit to author.
Hmm something is wrong with the formatter.
Renamed "files" folder to libs and reorganized it to work better with my setup.
Ported the first 3 chapters to OpenGL 3.2.
Updated GL32 and GLProgram to fix core/compatibility issues.
Removed extraneous file and added Scene.java, no clue why that was ever removed.
Example 17.2 almost fully ported, still something wrong with the lighting.
